instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' font for all headings to give it that modern Zomato feel.
Primary color #E23744 must be used for primary actions (Add to Cart, Checkout, Login).
Use generous white space. Avoid dense grids. Let the food images breathe.
Implement a 'Bottom Navigation Bar' for mobile view (Home, Menu, Loyalty, Profile).
Use 'Sonner' for toast notifications (e.g., 'Item added to cart').
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
For the 'About' page, use the student group image to show community connection.
Loyalty section should feel special - use a gradient background for the points card.
Strictly follow the 2km radius rule in the UI - show a clear error/warning if out of range.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use left-aligned text for readability.
Ensure high contrast for text. No gray-on-gray.
Mobile-first approach is mandatory. Test responsiveness.
Use 'framer-motion' for subtle page transitions and button taps.
